synthesis_conditions.literature_source: according to the literature with minor modifications
synthesis_conditions.pressure: 0.1 bar and 1 bar for gas adsorption studies
synthesis_conditions.time: 12 h for exposing into N2 or O2 atmosphere
synthesis_conditions.equipment: single-crystal X-ray diffraction (SCXRD) for framework analysis

additional_information.Xe_uptake_capacity: 2.65 mmol g-1 at 0.1 bar and 298 K
additional_information.Kr_uptake_capacity: 0.52 mmol g-1 at 0.1 bar and 298 K
additional_information.cycle_performance: no decrease in Xe uptake after ten cycles
